NAME: Sangeeta Roy
ABOUT: A hardworking and dedicated Business Analyst who have acquired extensive knowledge through the study of Statistical Economics(Econometrics) in Masters program and previous work experience in establishing business requirement and performing analysis to deal with real world business problem.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Sales Forecasting for a leading technology company
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Tasks:
Exploratory Data Analysis such as missing value imputation
Various machine learning and forecasting models were built like Linear Regression, Ridge and Lasso Regression, Elastic-Net and ARIMA
Calculated adoption and accuracy, which were the key parameters tracked by the client

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Segmentation based on In-game Engagement-Mortal Kombat 11- WB
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Tasks
Datapull from Database server
Exploratory Data Analysis like Data cleaning and Missing Value imputation
Dimensionality reduction via VIF / PCA
Grouping of customers into different segments using various clustering technique
Validation of results using Silhouette and Dunn index
Recommendation based on profiling results

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Forecasting Sales Volume for 3year for a leading liquor brand
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Tasks:
Data extraction from different data sources and Data creation
Usage of log-log modelling and Finding Year on Year growth of variables
Calculation of the elasticities and the significance of each variable
Validation of Year on Year growth based on previous years
